Title: [Updated] Drilling Engineering and Technical Services Market Size Analysis | Jereh Oilfield Services Group, ZPEC ... - economica.ma
Summary: The 2024 Global Drilling Engineering and Technical Services Market report offers a comprehensive analysis of the market's current and future trends, pricing, and geographical dynamics from 2024 to 2031. Title: Nicola Mining Announces Completion of 3D IP Survey and Commencement of Exploration Drilling at the New ... - StockTitan
Summary: Nicola Mining completed a 3D induced polarization (IP) survey at its New Craigmont Copper Project, revealing significant resistivity and chargeability anomalies. Based on these findings, Nicola has initiated a 2024 diamond drilling program targeting 5,000 meters of core drilling, starting with the West Craigmont Zone. This survey aims to define key exploration targets and enhance confidence in the project's potential.

Title: Drilling barge ready for Eni's Caspian Sea wildcat - Upstream Online
Summary: The Caspian Explorer drilling barge, owned by Caspian Sunrise, is prepared for Eni's drilling operations in the Caspian Sea. The drilling success could potentially allow Caspian Sunrise to trade the barge for a minority interest in an offshore Kazakhstan development project. This move signifies strategic positioning in the region's oil and gas exploration activities.
